Description: Describes the type of catchment (1-Reach, 2-Bank, 3-Empty, 4-Water, 5-Built-up Area)
An additional description for catchment (10-Lake, 11-Great Lake, 12-Wastewater Point, 20-Estuary, 30-Nearshore Zone, 40-River, 41-Canal, 50-Buried Infrastructure, 90-Ocean, 99-Unknown)
Link to the id field in the AOI table.
References the id field in the Names table.
A true value indicates if the ecatchment is a reservoir (i.e., an artificially-controlled lake). Equivalent to waterDefinition Reservoir (5) in the nhn. Default is false.
